about_the_game:
※All the characters in this game are over 18 years old.

*This game will not run if the display resolution is 2560 x 1080 or higher.
(If you are using an ultra-wide monitor, etc., please lower the resolution of the display from the setting screen of your computer, etc.)

Reika visits the village of Seille as a bodyguard for a female merchant Fomia.

Although Reika is inferior to Fomia, she is a reliable female knight.

She looks like a normal beautiful female knight at first glance, but what will she experience in the village of Seille ...

An easy-to-play, battle-free RPG!

【Method of Operation】
Arrow Keys: Move
Enter, Z: Select
Esc, X: Menu / Cancel
A: Backlog display
Shift: Switch dash / Clear message window (during conversation)
Ctrl: Story Skip
Alt: Automatic message sending (during conversation)
PrintScreen: Screenshot

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains the following sexual content
・Strong language 
・Sexual language
